content.raw:
When using the following command “ign service -s /world/default/playback/control --reqtype ignition.msgs.LogPlaybackControl --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 6000 --req "seek: \{sec: $1175\}, pause: false" I am able to skip to the desired spot of the state.tlog \(1175 seconds in sim time\). However when I go to 2175 seconds or 3175 seconds I find I am at the exact same spot in the simulation log. It appears that this functionality only works over 1000 seconds intervals before it repeats. Has anyone else run into this and is there a way to fix it?

‌

However when I go to 2175 seconds or 3175 seconds I find I am at the exact same spot in the simulation log.
